note.p: Career: Justice of the Peace; accompanied his distant relative and close friend Ralph Thoresby (FRS 1697) on his antiquarian travels; with his son, Thomas (died 1709), built up a fine library and museum which were sold in 1710.
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; Venn; Hunter
References: W H G Armytage, 'Sir Godfrey Copley, FRS (1653-1709). Some Tercentenary Glimpses through Letters to his Friends' in NR 1954-55 vol 11 pp 54-74
Notes: Proposed by Sir John Hoskins
